location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.4769 of 1853 from Arthur Malet, Chief Secretary of the Government, Bombay, to Captain Arnold Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of Kemball's previous two letters regarding the maltreatment of the Native Agent at Sharjah, noting that the Governor in Council approves of Kemball's proceedings.
